sentence.Network_cn: 这些日子他们极不友好.

sentence.Network_en: That's probably the most bare, bleak, barren and inhospitable island I've ever seen.
sentence.Network_cn: 那可能是我见过的最荒凉的岛屿，荒无人烟，寸草不生。

sentence.Network_en: If you have men and women thrown together in inhospitable surroundings, you are going to get some sexual tension.
sentence.Network_cn: 你要是让男人和女人一起呆在不友好的环境里，男女关系肯定会紧张。

a global catastrophe almost wipes mankind from the face of the earth and you must survive in an inhospitable world . violent gangs control society club law is the only kind that counts .一个全球性的灾害几乎摧毁地球表面，你必须拯救这个荒凉的世界，黑帮控制了整个社会，暴力是唯一的方法。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: French, from in- 'not' + hospitable (see hospitable)

entry.def: An inhospitable place is unpleasant to live in.

example.tran: 地球上最不适合居住的地区
岛上不适合居住的气候

entry.def: If someone is inhospitable, they do not make people welcome when they visit.

auth_sentence.content: Oceans, too, have their inhospitable pockets.

auth_sentence.content: It is so much more inhospitable to life than earth.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is so much more inhospitable to life than earth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is so much more inhospitable to life than earth.

auth_sentence.content: I guess you couldn't blame her for being inhospitable.

Sentence.sentence: If in these activities the physical features of the planet are damaged, if the environment is made inhospitable for a multitude of living species,then so be it.
